snippet: The Chiefs' appeal of anti-tampering violations was denied by NFL Commissioner Roger Goodell on Monday, a decision that drew a strong rebuke from influential owner and team chairman Clark Hunt....
lead_paragraph: The Chiefs' appeal of anti-tampering violations was denied by NFL Commissioner Roger Goodell on Monday, a decision that drew a strong rebuke from influential owner and team chairman Clark Hunt.

headline.main: Goodell Rejects Chiefs' Appeal of Anti-Tampering Violations
headline.print_headline: Goodell Rejects Chiefs' Appeal of Anti-Tampering Violations
